snippet: Raymond Roth was receiving psychiatric treatment at a Long Island hospital, his lawyer said.
abstract: Raymond Roth, a Long Island man suspected of faking his drowning in a plot to collect life insurance, is said to be receiving psychiatric treatment at a hospital; Roth's son Jonathan Roth, faces charges including conspiracy to commit insurance fraud.
lead_paragraph: Raymond Roth was receiving psychiatric treatment at a Long Island hospital, his lawyer said.

headline.seo: Man Whose Wife Said He Faked His Drowning Is Hospitalized, Lawyer Says
headline.main: Man Suspected of Faking His Drowning Is Said to Be in the Hospital
headline.print_headline: Man Suspected of Faking Death Is Said to Be in Hospital
